name: BlastomycosisTestsForBlastomycesSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Blastomycosis (Tests for Blastomyces species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of blastomyces species in a culture.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: blastomycosis|blastomyces|blastomycotic),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
